summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the west 355.5' of the ease 385.5' of the south 150' of the North 1/2 of the NW 1/4 of the SW 1/4 of the SE 1/4 of Sec. 29-26-4, with respect to Use District, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-406.
